price: ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߟߊߖߌ߰ ߛߎ߫ ߓߊ߲ߓߊ߲ߣߍ߲ ߘߐ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߞߍߣߍ߲߫ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatin mubārakatin innā kunnā mundhirīna
